Translations.Text: However, We will first let them taste a lesser punishment [on earth] prior to the greater punishment, so that perhaps they may return [to the right path]
Who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the signs of his Lord and then turns away from them? We will make those who force others to reject God's messages to pay a price
We gave Moses the Book, so do not be in doubt that you are receiving the same [revelation]. And we made the Book guidance for the Children of Israel
We raised leaders from among them who, as long as they were steadfast and believed firmly in Our messages, guided them according to Our command
Your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection regarding their differences
Hasn't it become clear to them yet how many generations We destroyed before them, through whose ruined homes they now walk? In that are signs; don't they listen
Have they not seen that We drive rain to barren land and bring forth vegetation from which they and their livestock eat? Do they not see
They say, "When will this judgment be, if you are telling the truth
Say, "On the Day of Judgment, it will be of no use for the unbelievers to believe, nor will they be given amnesty
So turn away from them and wait. They are waiting
